replies.body:
You can refund [eligible content](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751864-Content-Refund-FAQ) by going to the store, then hitting the 'account' button and navigating to the 'purchase history' section. From here you can use any remaining *refund tokens* to refund any eligible content within the last 90 days. 

Let me know if you have any questions.
